// Edge Transit (PvE/DPS)
//notes: Suprisingly the roll everyone is chasing does not do the most damage/DPS.  So Envious/Bait'n'Switch, is not the meta.  It's actually Deconstrut, with only 6 in the magazine. https://youtu.be/XYDGYwHA6Uo?si=APVaA3KcqtUcwpMt
dimwishlist:item=568611923&perks=968510818,3078487919


// Edge Transit(Special combos)
//notes: If you want to do more damage by travelling far, better do it fast. i.e. Impulse Amplifier and full court.
dimwishlist:item=568611923&perks=951095735,2888557110

// Succession - Succession  (god-pve)
//notes: Use another weapon kill to proc Discord.  Don't miss your red bar enemies, and you'll get all your wasted ammo back.  But wait, you procced "Redirection"", which if you build 20 stacks, will give you 100% damage boost again a more powerful enemy. tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=3612338554&perks=3978468247,3201496230


// Succession - Succession (pve)
//notes: Standard Great PVE roll tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=3612338554&perks=1840239774,2420895100,1523832109,1771339417


// Succession - Succession interesting PVP (pvp)
//notes: Proc Discord to save wasting Special Ammo, and Snapshot to go on a sniper spree.  Choose your Barrel, Mag and MW to suit.  Handling preferred of course.  tags:pvp
dimwishlist:item=3612338554&perks=3978468247,957782887


// Succession - Succession standard PVP (pvp)
//notes: Boring.  Handling MW would be nice.  "Bite of the Fox" is a better PVP void sniper though, with less crazy scope zoom. tags:pvp
dimwishlist:item=3612338554&perks=839105230,3142289711,1523832109,1546637391

// Elsie's Rifle (DFP pvp roll)
//notes: As picked by Destiny Fun Police.  Use a counterbalance stock, and Reload MW. tags:pvp
dimwishlist:item=2372514509&perks=1482024992,1885400500,2387244414,3047969693

// Elsie's Rifle (True Vanguard pvp roll)
//notes: As picked by True Vanguard.  This pulse has 35 base stat points more than Messenger, slightly less range but way more stability and handling.  MW:Range or Reload.  tags:pvp
dimwishlist:item=2372514509&perks=1482024992,1885400500,2387244414,3047969693

// Elsie's Rifle - Elsie True Vanguard Special (pve)

// Falling Guillotine - Falling Guillotine MJC Eager Edge (pve)
//notes: Yes, this is the roll Michael would like.  Eager Edge for movement, but out of all the damage perks/effects in column 3, I think Chain reaction is the best perk combo there.  Swing in, kill, and anything else around you explodes (So you can run away safely).  MW:Impact tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=1815105249&perks=2396489472,2077819806


// Falling Guillotine - Falling Guilotine Duddits Ad clear (pve,pvp)
//notes: Volatile chain reaction.  Not much more needed to say. tags:pve,pvp

// Edge Transit - Edge Transit - Blow my Load (god-pve)
//notes: Aztecross(https://youtu.be/5zkK-PrEw0E?si=TMJXZAwq2-xyDaA6) Want both Cascade Point and Envious Assassin on the same weapon.  Use Envious Assassin to overload the mag, and before DPS switch to Cascade Point. tags:pve
dimwishlist:item=568611923&perks=968510818,3751912585
